DOC.brief_summary: Hypochondriasis ( health anxiety ) common , many negative consequence afflict individual associate high societal cost . Cognitive Behavioural Therapy ( CBT ) proven effective administer live-sessions . The aim study investigate whether CBT remain effective administered via self-help programme Internet .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-delivered Cognitive Behavioral Therapy ( CBT ) Health Anxiety
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis hypochondriasis At least 18 year old Able read write swedish Computer access Drug abuse Concurrent severe depression No serious somatic illness Previous treatment CBT hypochondriasis
